content.en: Dermatology data analysis: Researchers are using algorithms to answer a variety of questions related to dermatologic research. These algorithms, such as the Informatics for Integrated Biology and the Bedside (i2b2) platform, ICD-9 diagnosis codes, claims-based algorithms, and screening algorithms, are being utilized to identify patients with psoriasis and psoriatic arthritis, detect comorbidities, assess treatment patterns, and analyze healthcare resource utilization. By analyzing electronic health records, claims data, and administrative data, these algorithms are helping researchers gain insights into the prevalence, diagnosis, treatment, and economic burden of psoriasis and psoriatic arthritis.
content.da: Dermatologisk dataanalyse: Forskere bruger algoritmer til at besvare en række spørgsmål relateret til dermatologisk forskning. Disse algoritmer, såsom Informatics for Integrated Biology og Bedside (i2b2)-platformen, ICD-9 diagnosekoder, kravbaserede algoritmer og screeningsalgoritmer, anvendes til at identificere patienter med psoriasis og psoriasisartrit, opdage komorbiditeter, vurdere behandlingsmønstre og analysere anvendelsen af sundhedsressourcer. Ved at analysere elektroniske sundhedsregistre, kravdata og administrative data hjælper disse algoritmer forskere med at få indsigt i forekomsten, diagnosen, behandlingen og den økonomiske byrde af psoriasis og psoriasisartrit.
